programme.desc: Despite the boom of the 21st century development, Tallinn, the 1000-year-old capital of Estonia, safeguards its UNESCO-listed medieval Old Town, one of Europe’s most complete walled cities. Marco Biagioli and Erica Melargo, a famous Italian nomad couple, lose themselves in its fairy-tale charms, and find out its legends. They also visit iconic attractions such as Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and Raeapteek, the oldest pharmacy in Europe that has continuously been in business in the same building.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.desc: Bled is like something out of a dream

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Costa Rica Calling San Jose
programme.desc: Guided by her love for coffee, Genevieve ventures into the heart of Heredia, a lush coffee-growing region.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Off The Grid Loango National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Step into the wilds of Loango where you’ll see unique lowland gorillas, elephants and wild buffaloes blissfully strolling in their natural habitats.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.desc: Eight states. Three time zones. One road: Route 66! A young American traveler, Genevieve has taken on the granddaddy of all American road trips.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: The pillowy goodness of Bengali sweets is even more famous in India than some of Kolkata’s landmarks. Alex, however, sets out to discover the forgotten sweets of Bengal. She meets some veteran sweet shop owners in the city, who show her how to make some lesser-known traditional sweets.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.desc: Sabrina visits a quaint town with mountain views and medieval houses

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Costa Rica Calling Heredia
programme.desc: Genevieve’s adventures in Costa Rica begin in the capital city, San Jose, where she checks off some Costa Rican rites of passage.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Off The Grid Monte De Crystal, Gabon
programme.desc: Get ready to take on exciting wildlife adventures of Monte De Crystal with Emeline. The national park enveloped by misty clouds adds an ethereal feeling to nature’s canvas.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Route 66 Northern Arizona, USA
programme.desc: Eight states. Three time zones. One road: Route 66! A young American traveler, Genevieve has taken on the granddaddy of all American road trips.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Khad Maas is a celebrated Rajasthani dish with war-time origins. Game meat used to be slow-cooked in underground pits created to ensure that the fire could not be seen by enemy troops. Due to its intricate and cumbersome preparation, the dish seldom graces tables in Rajasthan today. Alex learns how to prepare this with the cultural conservationist, Trivikram.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. From the fortress of Narva and the bastions of Narva to an abandoned textile mill, everything tells them about the intriguing story of the town. They also learn about the Russian and ‘alien’ people living here.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unbound Soca Valley, Slovenia
programme.desc: Slovenia’s Soca Valley, a land of aquamarine river rapids

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Costa Rica Calling Chilamate
programme.desc: In the heart of Costa Rica's countryside, Genevieve embarks on a journey of cultural immersion in Chilamate.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Off The Grid Lope National Park, Gabon
programme.desc: Emeline puts on her adventurous garb as she strolls around the gorgeous rainforest and savanna of Lope National Park.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.desc: Eight states. Three time zones. One road: Route 66! A young American traveler, Genevieve has taken on the granddaddy of all American road trips.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: The sheer ingenuity and artistry of Rajasthani cuisine is an enduring testament to the skill and grim determination of the people who have made their homes in this largely arid land. Alex finds out that this applies to the imperial cuisine of the state as well, when she meets Trivikram and learns from him how to prepare a traditional meat dish, that was made using meat leftovers.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.desc: In Piran and Portoroz, two beautiful towns on the Slovenian Riviera

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Costa Rica Calling Rincon de la Vieja
programme.desc: Costa Rica is home to nearly 30 national parks, and Genevieve sets out to explore one of them, Rincón de la Vieja.

programme.title: Off The Grid Libreville, Gabon
programme.desc: The capital of Gabon, Libreville offers an off the grid route to the host Emeline. From the scenic trails of Pongara National Park to exciting beach experiences, Libreville comes across as a pleasant surprise. But what’s more exciting is watching a number of sea turtles making their nests and hatching eggs near the beach. Emeline’s quest also leads her to a tête-à-tête with a conservationist where she learns about saving turtles.

programme.title: Route 66
programme.desc: Eight states. Three time zones. One road: Route 66! A young American traveler, Genevieve has taken on the granddaddy of all American road trips.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Quest Karni Fort, India
programme.desc: After finding his grandparents’ handwritten recipes, Vikramaditya Sodawas, the owner of Karni Fort, decided to revive his family’s prized recipes.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Estonia Sooma National Park
programme.desc: Embracing Estonia’s largest area of swamps, meadows and waterside forests, Soomaa National Park is the second largest national park in the country. While trying out bog walking and camping over here, Marco and Erica experience what is known as the “fifth season” in Estonia, the season of floods. They also explore Tallinn’s history with espionage, and go on to soak in the romance at its Christmas Market.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Costa Rica Calling Puntarenas
programme.desc: Venturing deep into Puntarenas, Genevieve seeks an adrenaline rush in the lush embrace of Monteverde.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Every car owner gets the chance to bring their tuned machines to the Sofitel Hotel Dubai Jumeirah beach; there, Saif Hattawi will assess each car based on speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: The Walk at JBR, the most prestigious location in Dubai, is the background for fast customized cars in the Middle East; among the competitors are a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi are on the hunt for cars and ask car owners to bring their customized vehicles to Dubai; among the presented cars are a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: A tuned Lexus GSF, a Ford Mustang and a McLaren MP4-12C are put in the spotlight.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: The Audi RS6 is the benchmark, when it comes to extreme estate cars, featuring 560 hp output combined with a maximum torque of 700 newtonmeters and an acceleration from zero to 100 km/h in 3.9 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: You want to feel like a race driver? The British car manufacture Radical can make your dreams come true.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Those living outside United States need to import cars the likes of Corvette C7 and Ford Mustang.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: For Porsche fans, it's the ultimate fusion of road suitability and race track compatibility: The Porsche 911 GT3. With its 475 hp engine and a maximum torque of 440 Newton-meters, it accelerates from zero to 100 km/h in 3.5 seconds.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nowadays you associate Bentley with elegance and luxury. But ever since its establishment in 1919, the British brand enjoys successes in motorsports as well.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Subaru shows the new look of WRX STI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Tesla Roadster Sport can go from 0-100 kph in 3.7 seconds with zero emission, only one aisle and only one engine with 50 kg. The 313 PS has four engines and no sound.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Infiniti wants to stir up the European market with its premium SUVs: The Power SUV FX50 S.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The three super cars from this episode promise more power and more elegance. Thanks to tuning company Kelleners Sport, the new BMW 640i Gran Coupe offers even more bite. Thanks to its beautiful equipment and additional legroom, the Maserati Quattroporte GTS encourages to travelling. Thanks to all-wheel drive, the Porsche 911 Carrera 4S offers more fun and more safety on critical terrain.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Test days at the legendary race track in France before the 90th Le Mans Race.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: At the 2013 Frankfurt Motor Show Porsche introduced the new 911 range. It includes the new Porsche 911 Turbo, which is the most powerful Porsche model yet. For 50 years Porsche has been making car drivers around the world very happy with its sports cars. In celebration of the anniversary Supercars takes a closer look at the past, present and future models of the Porsche 911.

programme.title: NASCAR Whelen Euro
programme.desc: In the 2025 season, Motorvision broadcasts all ENPRO class races live.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: From Magdeburg, Germany.

programme.desc: Everything that has wheels takes part to see who is the fastest over the 402 meter concrete track in Eisenach, Thuringen Germany.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: BMW Tuner Manhart Racing celebrates at the Nurburgring Track.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Zee delivers her impressions of the updated Isuzu MUX; the Hyundai Santa Fe receives a hybrid powertrain; Ernest finds out if Honda's Amaze fulfils the promise of its name.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: We go in search of the ideal bakkie for a growing food business; we find the perfect German sedan within a R1.2 million budget and we examine an Opel Corsa with ongoing turbo problems.

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: Most valuable collection of carefully kept cars in the back of garages.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Go old-timer crazy. A look at the Mercedes S with 160 horsepower, the car that lead Rudolf Caracciola to victory in the 1927 opening race.

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Patrick tears up the track in an Aston Martin Zagato with 12 cylinders.

programme.title: Track Masters

programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb of 1987: A different type of race in the mountains of Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since 1934, the Grand Prix has been the most exciting and fascinating world championship in the world. With its state-of-the-art vehicles, with horsepower from the biggest brands, it never fails to wow its viewers.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which ran from 1970 - 1972.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL 'lightweight' on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A BMW M5, in touring version.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Discovering Mechatronik, a company dedicated to the restoration and refinement of classic Mercedes-Benz. Also, a look at the Nissan 370 Z, Porsche Cayman, Chevrolet Camaro and Mercedes-AMG ML 63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The GT MF 5 is a power pack.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The who's who of automotive tuning congregate at the 82nd International Motor Show in Geneva, where around 180 European and global premiers will be shown.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The tuning forge MTM is known for their extremely dynamic, optimally tuned vehicles. Also, a look at the Nissan Juke-R, a projectile with 485 horsepower and the dimensions of a cigar box.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Selling more than a million cars per year, Audi is now one of the most successful car manufacturers in the world. The brand with the four rings stands for innovation, superior technology and outstanding design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of auto unions.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: At a time when horses and carriages characterized traffic, visionaries like Henry Ford were working on the mobility of tomorrow. His ideas and approaches have a major share of the individual mobilization in the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Remember the first Beetle? When did Ferdinand Porsche design this people's car? Follow the evolution of the automobile over the last century.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Le Mans are the toughest race in the world. In 1951 Porsche took part in the 24 hour-classic for the very first time and competed every year ever since. Till 1998 the Porsche enjoyed 16 victories with its prototypes.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option; the Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people; when it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow; in 2016, Mercedes-Benz introduced their Generation EQ and Volkswagen announced the making of 20 new electrified models by 2020.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Only true off-road vehicles convey the feeling of unlimited freedom and adventure. The Land Rover Defender ended production after more than 60 years, but the British make has already announced a successor.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The All Wheel Magazine reviews All-Wheel wagons from the compact, middle, and luxury class. With an output of 608 HP and a top speed of 325 kmph, the Alpina B5 Touring is the world's fastest wagon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: If cruising on the motorways is too boring, then off-road is the place to go. 4x4 shows how sporty and elegant SUVs really are, and which vehicles can really make your day on exciting off-road tracks.

programme.desc: A spring ride around Lake Starnberg in the Ferrari 458 Italia, a test drive of BMW's 6 series convertible at Table Mountain in South Africa, and a look at the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMW's 6 series models.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: BMW, one of the most successful automobile groups in the world, promises the joy of driving.

programme.title: Car History

programme.title: Car History

programme.title: Car History

programme.title: Car History

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Exuding sophistication and grandeur like no other, a select range of English limousines dominates the world of luxury vehicles.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: The Mercedes S-Class, the BMW 7-series, or the Audi A8; Limousines 'Made in Germany' are famous for their perfection and prestige and are considered as a status symbol.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They guarantee an exclusive appearance. More than any other car, International Limousines stand for status, prestige, and perfection. International limousines from Rolls Royce, Bentley, Mercedes, BMW, and Jaguar lead the pack.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: BMW M5, Mercedes-AMG E63, Audi RS6, and Mulsanne Speed: power limousines offer a unique mix of style, performance, and suitability for daily use. They combine the luxury of limousines with the dynamic of a super sports car.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Featuring cars built for speed, such as Bugatti Chiron, Lykan Hypersports, Pagani Huayra and Ferrari LaFerrari.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: Looking at the Tesla Model S, which was the world's first premium sedan that was developed from scratch as an electric car; Tesla shows the world that electromobility can be sexy and that it works.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A rare look behind the scenes at some of the planet's most exclusive factories.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Maserati's return to Italian motoring with a sportier model called the Ghibli.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Supercars shows you two of the most exciting convertibles in the world with a combined power of more than 1000 hp. The Aston Martin V12 Vantage S Roadster is probably the most amazing export from the UK.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Cayman GT4 combines the best elements that a Porsche can bring to you: 3.8 liter six-cylinder boxer engine from the 911 Carrera S, chassis, brake system and aerodynamics from the GT3 and six-gear transmission.

programme.title: Rolls-Royce Dawn Convertible
programme.desc: Almost silently, it glides through the night; in front of the driver, 12 smoothly running cylinders are at work, with a power reserve that seems inexhaustible; the Rolls Royce Dawn is a convertible for connoisseurs.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option; the Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people; when it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow; in 2016, Mercedes-Benz introduced their Generation EQ and Volkswagen announced the making of 20 new electrified models by 2020.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Only true off-road vehicles convey the feeling of unlimited freedom and adventure. The Land Rover Defender ended production after more than 60 years, but the British make has already announced a successor.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The All Wheel Magazine reviews All-Wheel wagons from the compact, middle, and luxury class. With an output of 608 HP and a top speed of 325 kmph, the Alpina B5 Touring is the world's fastest wagon.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: If cruising on the motorways is too boring, then off-road is the place to go. 4x4 shows how sporty and elegant SUVs really are, and which vehicles can really make your day on exciting off-road tracks.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: adidas Sickline - Extreme Kayak World Championship - The Documentary
programme.desc: This is the documentary about the history of the famous "Wellerbrücke" rapids, a famous section of the glacier-fed Ötztaler Ache river in Tyrol, and the adidas Sickline Extreme Kayak World Championship.

programme.title: Outdoorsports Team - The Fascination of ski Mountaineering
programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: Canyoning 2008
programme.desc: Canyoning is one of the most exciting outdoor sports and for many it is a true decathlon of extreme activities. Physical fitness, team spirit and trust are of the utmost importance.

programme.title: adidas Outdoorsports Team 2012: Canyoning - Unicycling - Slacklining
programme.desc: Modern outdoor sport has many facets. Today we follow the Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. We start in Ticino.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Fond of Font
programme.desc: Seb Berthe and Hugo Parmentier have set themselves quite a challenge: to complete 100 7A boulders on a single day. An extraordinary journey of over 80 km, when you consider how demanding these rocks are. Crimps, falls, slips but above all a magnificent human adventure.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Tenerife Blue Trail
programme.desc: We are back in Tenerife, one of the highlights of the ultra running calendar, for the 10th edition of the Tenerife Blue Trail. Tenerife is described as an outdoor gym open 365 days a year - a paradise for every athlete.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part I
programme.desc: "The Barrel" is a cinematic tribute to moments in big waves. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: The Barrel - Part II
programme.desc: The Barrel is a cinematic tribute to those big-wave moments. This program takes a journey to some legendary barrel destinations - Hawaii's Pipeline, Indonesia and Kirra on Australia's Gold Coast.

programme.title: The history of competitive Snowboarding
programme.desc: This Competition is in human nature. But that was far from the thoughts of early pioneers in the nineteen hundreds or those of Mister Sherman Poppin of Michigan. In the Christmas of 1965 he invented the Snurfer. This changed the history of snowsports.

programme.title: Eternal Flame
programme.desc: To jump from the top of Nameless Tower in Pakistan (6200m) after climbing the Eternal Flame route is to combine the ascent of one of the most beautiful climbing routes in the world with the opening of one of the most breathtaking BASE jumping exits imaginable.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: Ötztal Cycle Marathon (AUT)
programme.desc: The Ötztal Cycle Marathon 2024 in Austria, taking place on the 1st of September, is the most challenging cycling marathon in the Alps, offering a captivating mix of valley and high alpine terrain. The course spans 227 kilometers and over 4,000 participants.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2024 - Almeria (ESP)
programme.desc: The rugged landscapes of Almería, Spain, hosts one of the most challenging mountain bike races in the world - the Škoda Titan Desert Series. Over rocky trails and under the scorching Spanish sun, elite riders push their limits in this multi-stage endurance race.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: FIA – Intercontinental Drifting Cup 2021
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re pulling the handbreak tight and put the pedal to the medal with the best professional drift driver. The Intercontinental Drifting Cup took place in Riga, Lativa this year. Cars up to 850 horse powers and a challenging track!

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally is open! From today until Saturday, the best hard enduro riders will take on the toughest rally in the world in Romania! The Red Bull Romaniacs takes place every year and attracts participants from around 50 countries.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: Episode 36
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 36

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit für die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten über und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhälfte. Let's check out!

programme.title: Athlete profile: climber Lindsey Hamm's (USA) journey from concrete to peaks
programme.desc: Mammut athlete Lindsey Hamm, a professional mountaineer and mountain guide, brings a breath of fresh air to the world of mountaineering. This film gives an insight into her life and a recent expedition to the wild Charakusa Valley in Pakistan

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 1
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Swatch Freeride World Tour 2015 - 20th Anniversary Xtreme Verbier - Part 2
programme.desc: 2015 is the year of the 20th anniversary of Xtreme Verbier. As the legendary wall of the Bec des Rosses has always been one of the most spectacular places for freeriding and has also hosted the final of the Freeride World Tour for years, it is now time to look back!

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: A Song for Tomorrow
programme.desc: This April, Mayan Smith-Gobat and Ben Rueck joined China's renowned mountaineers Liu Yongbang (Abond) and Xiao Ting on an expedition to explore the Qingfeng Valley on the border of Zhangjiajie, China's first and largest national park.

programme.title: Episode 36
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 36

programme.title: Nendaz Freeride FWT Challenger - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 5
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 6
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.title: The Mt. Logan Wanderers

programme.title: FIA – Intercontinental Drifting Cup 2021

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour

programme.title: Extremsportveko "The Beauty of Outdoor Sports"

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)

programme.desc: The 2025 Formula Wing European Championships will bring together the continent's best wingfoil athletes for a week of thrilling high-speed racing. Competitors will compete against each other in dynamic races against a breathtaking backdrop

programme.title: WHY WE FLY

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is a motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. With world-class drivers and riders, participants tackle challenging dunes and rugged terrain.
